Client.Name: The Rieseberg Lab at the University of British Columbia

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Sunyard is a fintech company that provides comprehensive solutions, products, and services to industry clients. In recent years, the company has continuously focused on the deep integration of new intelligent technologies with financial services, consistently delivering cutting-edge, intelligent, end-to-end large-scale solutions and operational services aimed at the future. It is committed to connecting financial industry clients with government and enterprise customers through digital financial technology.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: This dataset captures Sunflower's genetic diversity originating from thousands of wild, cultivated, and landrace sunflower individuals distributed across North America.The data consists of raw sequences and associated botanical metadata, aligned sequences (to three different reference genomes), and sets of SNPs computed across several cohorts.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: Our team has independently developed a data slicing tool that accurately meets the storage requirements of the Filecoin network. Currently, some publicly available data preparation tools, such as Boost, go-graphsplit, and Singularity, are also within our consideration.
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, IPFS, Shipping hard drives, Lotus built-in data transfer
